book.synopsis: Newly-jacketed edition designed to celebrate the 50th Anniversary of Christie

s highly successful stage play which won the New York Drama Critics Circle Award for best foreign play. A stunning courtroom drama, it tells the story of a scheming wife testifying against her husband in a shocking murder trial. The wild beauty of a seaside house perched high on The Devonshire River Tern provides a stunning back-drop in Towards Zero -- as a psychopathic murderer homes in on the unsuspecting victims. Passion, murder and love are the deadly ingredients in Verdict, making it one of Christie

: ['Agatha Christie'], 'title: Witness for the Prosecution : And Selected Plays
